pl.marcinmazur.portfolio.service

Class StatisticServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.marcinmazur.portfolio.service.StatisticServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatisticService

    @Service
public class StatisticServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatisticService
    Service class for managing statistics of access codes and project visiting.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur
